blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: A Song of Marvel and Vengeance
title: A Song of Marvel and Vengeance
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JuHtM7

by Areias

In a cataclysmic event termed the ‘Ragnarok’, the almighty Valyrian Freehold has fallen. Two decades of chaos ensued as city states vie for control, while the self-crowned High Queen Hela, the Lady of Death, searches far and wide for her two renegade brothers…

Meanwhile, across the Narrow Sea, Westeros was the same as it had always been: Divided.

King Antony Eddard Stark, the Iron Wolf, rules over the North, locked in a generations-old conflict with the River Kings of Hydrahal. After a hunting trip gone wrong, the King meets an unlikely savior in the forest, a masked child-like figure with a crude spider drawn on his tunic…

In the Vale, Prince Samwell Arryn, the Falcon of the Eyrie, sets out with his loyal friend, Ser Stefon Rodgers, to find their friend and companion, Ser Jaymes Barnes, who’d reportedly gone missing somewhere near Hydrahal…

On the Wall, there are more worrying news. Before she went missing, the legendary First Ranger, Lady Carol the Marvelous, had sent back alarming ravens regarding whispered rumors of a Night King. Lord Commander Nic Durrandon the Furious fears that this might be the Long Night that was once prophecied…

Words: 3692, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies), Thor (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Guardians of the Galaxy (Movies), Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (TV), Ant-Man (Movies), Black Panther (2018), Captain Marvel (2019), Deadpool (Movieverse)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Hela (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Sam Wilson (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man), Harley Keener, Carol Danvers, Stephen Strange, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Pietro Maximoff, Wong (Marvel), Phil Coulson, T'Challa (Marvel), Nakia (Black Panther), Shuri (Marvel), Hank Pym, Hope Van Dyne, Scott Lang, Bruce Banner, Helen Cho, Erik Selvig, Erik Killmonger, Okoye (Marvel), M'Baku (Marvel), Peter Quill, Gamora (Marvel), Thanos (Marvel), Groot (Marvel), Drax the Destroyer, Rocket Raccoon, Mantis (Marvel), Nebula (Marvel), Yondu Udonta, Wade Wilson, Sharon Carter (Marvel), Peggy Carter, Chewie | Goose (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, Loki & Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner & Brunnhilde | Valkyrie & Hulk & Loki & Thor, Nick Fury & Maria Hill, Carol Danvers & Nick Fury, Scott Lang/Hope Van Dyne, Natasha Romanov & Wade Wilson, Pietro Maximoff & Wanda Maximoff, Nakia (Black Panther)/T'Challa, Michelle Jones & Peter Parker & Shuri
  • Additional Tags: Set after the Doom of Valyria, All Houses are replaced by an MCU faction/hero, Parent Tony Stark, Kid Peter Parker, Tony Stark Has A Heart


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JuHtM7

title: Past, Present, Future
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2WfjJND

by H_L_Hunter

[ Steve: ] Want some company?
It was a long shot. Bucky had made it clear many times he wanted to be alone for a little while, but Steve could always try.
[ Bucky: ] Yes :-)
Steve smiled.
[ Steve: ] Count to a million; I’m on my way <3
CONVERSATION ENDED

When Bucky leaves the Compound on a road trip to clear his mind, he disappears when a threat nearly manages to kill the Avengers. With the threat gone, Steve tries to find Bucky again, only to find that he didn’t actually want anyone to find him.

Words: 5536, Chapters: 2/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Phil Coulson, James Montgomery Falsworth, Other Avengers
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Angst, Getting Together, Bucky Barnes Feels, Not Captain America: Civil War (Movie) Compliant, Bucky Barnes & Peter Parker Friendship, Minor Original Character(s), How Do I Tag, Self-Indulgent, This is probably really bad….., But I LOVE IT!!!, Tony Stark Is a Good Bro, Precious Peter Parker, We all love Peter, Steve has a pet goldfish called Peggy, Phil Coulson Is a Good Bro

blog.description: follow backs from sunbean72 My Tony Stark side blog. I'm probably gonna call you sweetheart or hun if you talk to me, fair waring

tags: you wanted to lose together so
finally they're on the same page
that small we will from tony broke my heart tho
omg please reblog my stuff i'm dying in likes lol
summary: HOW DID I MISS THIS ONE??  Steve: We lost... all of us. We lost friends. We lost family. Today we have a chance to take it all...
caption:
HOW DID I MISS THIS ONE??

Steve: We lost… all of us. We lost friends. We lost family. Today we have a chance to take it all back.

Tony: We will.

Steve: Whatever it takes. Whatever it takes.

Tony: Whatever it takes.

reblog.comment:

title: The Night We Met

blog.name: team-downey-1965
blog.title: RDJ FAN PAGE!!! TEAM DOWNEY!!!
blog.description: My old account (team-downey1965 ) closed. This my new account.

blog.name: thebestdefenderofearth
blog.title: Big Mood
blog.description:
Hispanic | 21 | Bi | She/her

I will protect Tony Stark, Bucky Barnes, and Loki with my life.

We don’t hate anyone on this blog!!! So if you’re anti- anyone then stay away.

Warnings: I rant a lot.

body:
THINGS I WANT IN ENDGAME

1. Tony’s happiness and safe return

2. Tony and Steve reunion/makeup that will make me cry

3. Tony x Nebula friendship

4. Tony x Carol friendship

5. Thor x Carol friendship

6. Carol x Valkyrie meet ;)

7. Rhodey and Tony parallel reunion from Iron Man.

8. Rhodey x Rocket teamup

9. Scott Lang happy and declared an Avenger

10. Aunt May mourning Peter and then reuniting with Peter

11. Pepper Potts suiting up and being a boss

12. Tony and Pepper wedding

13. Thor reunion with his people (and Loki, pls)

14. Carol x Fury x Goose reunion

15. All my badass woman teaming up (Carol, Nat, Pepper, Valkyrie, Nebula.)

16. Steve and Tony forgiving each other and being friends like we deserve.

17. Steve making the sacrifice play to prevent Tony from doing it.

17a. BUT I ALSO WANT STEVE TO HAVE A DAMN BREAK FROM BEING JUST SOLDIER LIKE PLS HAVE STEVE BE HAPPY INSTEAD IN THE 40s

18. Clint x Nat friendship (I NEED IT)

19. Bruce x Tony sciencebro reunion

20. Bruce x Hulk learning to work together.

21. Scott Lang x Hope reunion + Hope meeting the Avengers

22. T’Challa and Okoye + T’Challa and his country

23. Nebula avenging her sister and giving the kill blow

thanks for coming to my ted talk
summary: Imagine Stephen being patient and showing both Tony and Quill his magic and trying to explain it, specially to Tony, with...
body:
Imagine Stephen being patient and showing both Tony and Quill his magic and trying to explain it, specially to Tony, with scientific terms as best as he can. He doesn’t want Tony to fear him nor his magic.

Imagine Quill in his spaceship showing Stephen and Tony the most beautiful points in the galaxy and brand new planets as he explains their cultures. He wants Tony to see the universe is more beautiful than awful.

Just… imagine them helping Tony overcoming his traumas to the best of their abilities.

reblog.comment:

Imagine Quill in his spaceship showing Stephen and Tony the most beautiful points in the galaxy and brand new planets as he explains their cultures. He wants Tony to see the universe is more beautiful than awful.

summary: “We’re mad scientists. We’re monsters. We gotta own it,buddy.”
body:
“We’re mad scientists. We’re monsters. We gotta own it,buddy.”

-Tony Stark convincing Bruce Banner to create Vision in Age of Ultron.

The best part is Tony just had to look at Bruce and Bruce knew what Tony was gonna say.

reblog.comment:
